summary: A playable race made by DanishDude93
descriptionHtml:
NOTE! Ive bought a new pc because my old one stopped working. Ive lost the file, and dont want to dl it again, and im busy doing other stuff, so i wont be able to update this mod. If you want to keep it alive, PM me, so we can talk about it :)

[color=LightSlateGrey][size=4]1. Description.[/size][/color]

Ok, so this is my first mod. It adds a custom race made by me. Its a simple, modified Dark Elf, which i called Blood Elf. I made this race because i wanted to have a blood elf in my game, but i couldnt find any on this website, nor the steam workshop. (So maybe this is the first Blood Elf mod for Skyrim? :O (Who knows))


[color=LightSlateGrey][size=4]2. About the Race.[/size][/color]

Advantage: Faster Magicka Regen.
Disadvantage: -50 Base Carry Weight points.

[b]Skill Bonus:[/b]
Light Armor: 10
Archery: 10
One-handed: 10
Restoration: 5
Speech: 5
Smithing: 5
Illusion: 5

[b]Specials:[/b]
Healing
HealingHands
Vampiric Drain (Racial Power[VampireDrain04])

Starting Health: 50 - (by default)
Starting Magicka: 50 - (by default)
Starting Stamina: 50 - (by default)
Base Carry Weight: 250 - (modified)
Health Regen: 0.7000 - (by default)
Magicka Regen: 0.5000 - (modified)
Stamina Regen: 0.5000 - (by default)


[color=LightSlateGrey][size=4]3. Installing & Uninstalling.[/size][/color]

[color=green] Installing: [/color] Just place the file into your skyrim data folder.
[color=red] Uninstalling: [/color] Remove the file.


[color=LightSlateGrey][size=4]4. To do list & Changelog.[/size][/color]

To do:
 - Add Vokulmer NPC\'s in various places.
 - Add various eyes colors.
 - Add various skin shades.
Leave a comment if you think i should add more stuff.

[b]Next - V1.2[/b] - Aiming for new eye colors and skin shade colors.

[b]V1.1[/b] - Did some minor changes to the racial skills, and added a Racial Power.

[b]V1.0[/b] - Created the mod.


[color=LightSlateGrey][size=4]5. Well...[/size][/color]

Leave a comment with your thoughts about my mod :D


Credits:

DanishDude93 (Myself :D)

Todd Howard

Bethesda 


[color=red]DO NOT[/color]
 - Upload this mod to any other sites. [Thats my job >:( ! ]
 - Improve this mod. [Thats my job >:( ! ]
 - Use this mod in other mods such as custom quest etc. [Atleast not without my permission. PM me if you want to use it]
author: DanishDude93
